text:
We just upgraded our version of tomcat from 3.2.1 to 3.2.3. We are having a
problem passing session data between contexts. It appears that the session is
being destroyed and a new session is started. We see the session ID changes when
switching contexts. In our server.xml file we have crossConnect set to true. We
did not experience this problem in tomcat 3.2.1.
creator: jcomeau@caldera.com
cmanolache@yahoo.com
text: Please try again with 3.3, let me know if you still have the problem.
